attributes.action: submit a bill banning people with very strong narcissistic traits from taking public office. This would ensure that people with real power would use it more inline with the average citizen's viewpoint.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the past persons with strong narcissistic traits have risen to public office. Unfortunately it is often only after they have left office that they have been found to have these traits, bringing into question their contribution during office.
PUBLIC OFFICE IS SUCH A POWERFULL AND SUPERIOR POSITION PEOPLE TAKING IT SHOULD BE VETTED TO PREVENT DAMAGE TO THE REST OF SOCIETY.
